title: Bookstore MERN
description: A MERN Bookstore project showcasing skills in MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.

title: Weather Application
description: A React-based Weather App fetching current weather data from OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Currency Converter
description: Utilizes custom hooks and API handling for a reusable currency conversion project.

title: Landing Page
description: Implements React routing with react-router-dom for a simple portfolio app, introducing routing concepts.

title: ToDo List
description: Uses local storage and Context API with React for data persistence and state management in a ToDo List.

title: Password generator
description: Implements performance optimizations with useEffect, useCallback, useRef, and memoization for a password generator project
